# <a name="add-a-birthday-calendar-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="d6688-102">在 Outlook.com 中新增生日行事曆</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6688-102">Add a birthday calendar in Outlook.com</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="d6688-103">在頁面底部，選取 [行事曆] 圖示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6688-103">At the bottom of the page, select the calendar icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="d6688-104">若要[移至行事曆](https://outlook.live.com/mail/calendar)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6688-104">to [go to Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/mail/calendar).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="d6688-105">在左窗格中，以滑鼠右鍵按一下 [**生日**並選取**新的生日**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6688-105">In the left pane, right-click **Birthdays** and select **New birthday**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="d6688-106">輸入該人員的名稱和出生日期，然後選取 [**建立**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6688-106">Enter the person's name and birth date, and select **Create**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="d6688-107">選取 [**生日**行事曆來開啟和關閉切換提醒。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6688-107">Select the **Birthday** calendar to toggle reminders on and off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d6688-108">深入了解[新增或移除 [生日] 及 [假日行事曆](https://support.office.com/article/b8e636da-fda8-413f-940e-68396efa49a6?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d6688-108">Learn more about [adding or removing birthday and holiday calendars](https://support.office.com/article/b8e636da-fda8-413f-940e-68396efa49a6?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
